enterprise_agents_distribution.note: 24 enterprise agents distributed across skills based on function

phase_1_extraction.description: Extract agent metadata and content from existing markdown files
steps: Parse YAML frontmatter (name, description, category, etc.)
Extract Core Competencies section
Extract Approach section
Extract Key Responsibilities section
Extract Collaboration section (important for cross-agent references)
Extract Integration section (TodoWrite, CLAUDE.md, MCP tools)
Discard: Performance Standards, Quality Gates, Implementation Guidelines (framework-specific, not needed in skill)

phase_2_transformation.description: Transform agent content into SKILL.md format
steps: Create skill directory structure
Generate SKILL.md with simplified YAML frontmatter (name, description only)
Consolidate Core Competencies + Approach + Key Responsibilities into unified instructions
Adapt Collaboration section to reference other agents within same skill or other skills
Preserve Integration instructions (TodoWrite, Extended Thinking, CLAUDE.md)
Add skill-specific guidance (when Claude should use this agent)

phase_3_aggregation.description: Combine multiple agents into single skill
steps: Create skill root SKILL.md with overview of all agents in skill
Create agents/ subdirectory with individual agent files
Generate agent index/navigation in main SKILL.md
Add skill-level guidance (when to load this skill, typical workflows)
Cross-reference agents within skill
Reference related skills for cross-skill collaboration
Verify YAML frontmatter valid (name, description within limits)
Check total skill size < 8MB
Validate agent references are resolvable
Test skill upload via API
Validate skill loads correctly in Claude Code
Test agent invocation within skill
